name: Blume Buds - Power Patches for Acne-Prone Skin
about: What it is:Â A hydrocolloid patch that draws out moisture and absorbs fluid and impurities to keep acne-prone skin protected and looking clear. Clinically tested to work in 6 hours...Skin Type: Normal..Skincare Concerns: Acne and Blemishes..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Salicylic Acid: Targets acne, redness, and blemishes..- Hydrocolloid: Absorbs fluids and shields skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Blume Buds are the most gentle, effective, and non-irritating way to help reduce the look of blemishes while shielding skin from scabs, scars, and redness..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Salicylic Acid: Targets acne, redness, and blemishes....Cellulose Gum, Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Rosin, Styrene/butadiene Copolymer, Polyurethane-1, Pentaerythrityl tetraethylhexanoate, Salicylic acid.......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-On freshly washed, dry skin, apply Blume Bud directly on affected area..-Wear for a minimum of four hours, or overnight..-Repeat with new Blume Bud as needed....Recycling Instructions:.-All packaging can be recycled.
